display_long_description:
#  🌟 Experience the Future of Photos & Videos with ScopeVR  🌟

ScopeVR is the revolutionary app that transforms your ordinary **2D photos 📸 and videos 🎥** into immersive **3D spatial experiences**. Using advanced AI technology, ScopeVR adds depth and dimension, creating **VR-ready memories** you can explore and interact with.

[media]

#  🤔 How does it work? 
Easily upload your photos or videos through the ScopeVR app, and let our AI transform them into stunning 3D media—ready to experience right inside the app.
[media]

# ✨ Why ScopeVR?

-   🖼️ **3D Photos:** Relive family gatherings, portraits, and landscapes with stunning depth.
    
-   🎬 **3D Videos:** Watch your favorite clips like never before — immersive, dynamic, and alive.
    
-   🤖 **AI-Powered Magic:** Our proprietary AI intelligently analyzes and enhances every frame.

-   🔮 **Immersive Mode:** Experience immersion level from 180 to 360 to custom Wide Field-of-View content.
    
-   🕶️ **VR-Ready:** Step directly into your memories with compatible VR headsets.
    
-   💾 **Your Gateway to the Past:** More than editing — it’s reliving.


With ScopeVR, your memories aren’t just viewed — **they’re experienced**.  
Download **ScopeVR** today and:  
👉 Transform your photos & videos  
👉 Step into your memories  
👉 Unleash the magic of 3D
